com.abbyy.mobile.rtr

Interface IRecognitionService.ExtendedSettings

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataCaptureService.ExtendedSettings, ITextCaptureService.ExtendedSettings
    Enclosing interface:
    IRecognitionService

    public static interface IRecognitionService.ExtendedSettings
    Extended service configuration settings. Settings for advanced users. Not used in typical scenarios

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getProcessingThreadsCount()
      Gets the number of processing threads to be used by the service.
      void setNamedProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets the named property of extended settings.
      void setProcessingThreadsCount(int threadsCount)
      Sets the number of processing threads to be used by the service.

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessingThreadsCount

        int getProcessingThreadsCount()
        Gets the number of processing threads to be used by the service.
        Returns:
        the number of threads, zero if the number should be determined automatically (default is zero)

      • setProcessingThreadsCount

        void setProcessingThreadsCount(int threadsCount)
        Sets the number of processing threads to be used by the service.
        Parameters:
        threadsCount - the new number of threads, zero if the number should be determined automatically (default is zero)

      • setNamedProperty

        void setNamedProperty(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the named property of extended settings. Must be called before IRecognitionService.start(int, int, int, Rect)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property
        value - the value of the property
